awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: Ben du Toit is a schoolteacher who always has considered himself a man of caring and justice, at least on the individual level. When his gardener's son is brutally beaten up by the police at a demonstration by black school children, he gradually begins to realize his own society is built on a pillar of injustice and exploitation.

title: A Dry White Season
